text:
@realDonaldTrump how do you know yet that they're doing it "safely"? oh and so...no special care for the people who are not seniors but will be the ones who could be risking infection by going back to work? #COVID19 

@POTUS @WhiteHouse @PressSec @Scavino45 @TeamTrump @CDCgov @Surgeon_General
